Queries.Name: GetItemsForHackathon
Queries.Template: SELECT DocumentId FROM HackathonItemsIndex where ContentType ='{{type}}'

Queries.Name: GetHacker
Queries.Template: SELECT * FROM HackathonItemsIndex where ContentType ='Hacker' and Published = true and Owner = '{{owner}}'

Queries.Name: GetHackersForTeam
Queries.Template: SELECT DocumentId FROM HackathonItemsIndex where ContentType ='Hacker' and TeamContentItemId = '{{teamContentItemId}}'
